word_mean: 吞气症：由于吞咽空气过多所致腹胀或嗳气，常为焦虑伴随的一种不自觉过程，而患者则常视为反映躯体有病的症象

sentence.Network_en: Excessive crying may cause aerophagia, which results in flatulence and abdominal distention.
sentence.Network_cn: 过度哭闹会引起吞气症, 导致气胀和腹胀.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 吞气症(Aerophagia)是由于小儿过度吞气引起腹胀、腹部不适,进而引起小儿限制进食,严重者可引起剧烈腹痛。
Observation on Recent Therapeutic Effectiveness of Regulating the Stomach and Lowering the Adverse Flow Decoction for Aerophagia with 68 Cases和胃降逆汤治疗吞气症68例近期疗效观察

means.word_mean: 1. swallowing air (usually followed by belching and discomfort and flatulence)
